类 Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser

  • class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parser with error recovery strategy that when parser encounter an unexpected token, it will discard all the following tokens until an expected one appear.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private boolean isWrong
      Whether the expression is wrong
      private static int lookahead
      The next token
      private static int previous
      The previous token
      private java.lang.String res
      Postfix expression of the input expression
      private Scanner scanner 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Parser()
      Constructor to initiate a scanner and get the first token for this parser.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Parser

        public Parser()
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor to initiate a scanner and get the first token for this parser.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if scanner fails to read from input

    • 方法详细资料

      • expr

        void expr()
   throws java.lang.Error
        Method for non-terminal expr
        抛出:
        java.lang.Error - if this parser encounters some syntax error

      • rest

        void rest()
   throws java.lang.Error
        Method for non-terminal rest.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Error - if this parser encoutners some syntax error

      • term

        void term()
   throws java.lang.Error
        Method for non'terminal term.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Error - if this parser encounters some syntax error

      • match

        void match(int t)
    throws java.lang.Error
        Method for match. If lookahead if the expected token, this method will get next token. Otherwise Error will be thrown.
        参数:
        t - the token that this parser want
        抛出:
        java.lang.Error - if lookahead if not the expected token

      • missDigit

        private void missDigit()
        Handler for situation where a digit is expected but another kind of token is recognized.

      • missOperator

        private void missOperator()
        Handler for situation where an operator is expected but another kind of token is recognized.

      • nspace

        private java.lang.String nspace(int n)
        Auxiliary function to generate the given number of spaces
        参数:
        n - the number of spaces expected to generate
        返回:
        a string containing n spaces
